ElectronicText.textData:
<head>
</head>

<#assign HOME_SUB_URL="/main" /> <#assign RINGS="${HTTP_HOST!}/rings" /> <#assign NECKLACE="${HTTP_HOST!}/necklace" /> <#assign BRACELET="${HTTP_HOST!}/bracelet-and-anklets" /> <#assign EARRINGS="${HTTP_HOST!}/earrings" /> <#assign GIFT="${HTTP_HOST!}/gift-ideas" /> <#if EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?exists && EMAIL_CLNT_LOGO?has_content>
Rings Necklace Bracelets & Anklets Earrings Gift Ideas

Thank you,

The ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} Team

${EMAIL_CLNT_REPLY_TO!""}

Visit us at: ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}

This message was sent to the following e-mail address: ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""} Not interested in ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} emails? It's easy to unsubscribe. Be sure to add ${EMAIL_CLNT_REPLY_TO!""} to your address book or safe senders list so our emails get to your inbox.

This email was sent from a notification-only email address that cannot accept incoming email. Â© 2013 ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} or its affiliates. All rights reserved. ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} and the ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} logo are trademarks of ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_LINK!""} or its affiliates.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thank you for registering your account with ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}.

Your login id is the Email address you supplied when you registered: ${LOGIN_EMAIL!""}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

We have generated a new password for you.

Your password has been changed to: ${password!""}

Use this password next time you log in.

You can change the password from the My Account page.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

${uiLabelMap.SalutationEmailInfo} ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thanks for recently visiting ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""} Just a reminder, the items we're holding in your shopping cart will expire in a few days.

To purchase the items in your cart now, just login to your account. You can also review your selections, add more items, change what you've already picked, and place your order by proceeding to checkout.

We will even sweeten the deal by offering you an additional ${discountPercent?if_exists} discount if you purchase these items today! Just enter the discount code ${promoCode?if_exists} during checkout.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_ITEMS" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

If you have any questions about our products, or need help with your purchase, please call our Customer Care Center at ${EMAIL_CLNT_TEL_NO!""}

Happy Shopping!

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

For more immediate attention you may call us at ${EMAIL_CLNT_TEL_NO!""} during our normal business hours of operation 9:00 to 5:00 EST. For all online inquiries, we will do everything we can to respond within [2 business days].

${uiLabelMap.ReasonForContactCaption} ${parameters.contactReason?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.FirstNameCaption} ${parameters.firstName!}

${uiLabelMap.LastNameCaption} ${parameters.lastName!}

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.email!}

<#if parameters.contactPhoneArea?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.ContactPhoneCaption} <#assign areaCode = parameters.contactPhoneArea!""> <#assign contactPhoneContact = parameters.contactPhoneContact!""> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + contactPhoneContact> <#if fullPhone?has_content && fullPhone?length == 10> <#assign contactPhoneContact = contactPhoneContact?substring(0, 3) + "-" + contactPhoneContact?substring(3)> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + "-" + contactPhoneContact> ${fullPhone!""}

<#if parameters.orderIdNumber?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.OrderNumberCaption} ${parameters.orderIdNumber!}

${uiLabelMap.CommentCaption} ${parameters.message!}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

You have requested a catalog and we will process this request as quickly as possible. The catalog will be mailed to:

<#if parameters.fullName?exists && parameters.fullName?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.AddressFullNameCaption} ${parameters.fullName!}

<#else>

${uiLabelMap.FirstNameCaption} ${parameters.firstName!}

${uiLabelMap.LastNameCaption} ${parameters.lastName?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.AddressLine1Caption} ${parameters.address1?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.AddressLine2Caption} ${parameters.address2?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.TownOrCityCaption} ${parameters.city?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.StateOrProvinceCaption} ${parameters.stateCode?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.PostalCodeOrZipCaption} ${parameters.postalCode?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.email?if_exists}

${uiLabelMap.ContactPhoneCaption} <#if fullPhone?has_content && fullPhone?length == 10> <#assign contactPhoneContact = contactPhoneContact?substring(0, 3) + "-" + contactPhoneContact?substring(4)> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + "-" + contactPhoneContact> ${fullPhone!""}

${uiLabelMap.CommentCaption} ${parameters.message?if_exists}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Request a Quote if you are ordering large quantities or have any special requirements.

${uiLabelMap.FirstNameCaption} ${parameters.firstName!}

${uiLabelMap.LastNameCaption} ${parameters.lastName!}

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.email!}

<#if parameters.contactPhoneArea?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.ContactPhoneCaption} <#assign areaCode = parameters.contactPhoneArea!""> <#assign contactPhoneContact = parameters.contactPhoneContact!""> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + contactPhoneContact> <#if fullPhone?has_content && fullPhone?length == 10> <#assign contactPhoneContact = contactPhoneContact?substring(0, 3) + "-" + contactPhoneContact?substring(3)> <#assign fullPhone = areaCode + "-" + contactPhoneContact> ${fullPhone!""}

<#if parameters.partNumber?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.PartNumberCaption} ${parameters.partNumber!}

${uiLabelMap.CommentCaption} ${parameters.message!}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Thank you for your purchase! Below is a confirmation of your order.

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_DETAIL" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

<#assign statusId = ""/> <#assign statusDescription = ""/> <#assign pickupInStore = "N"/> <#if ORDER?has_content> <#assign statusItem = ORDER.getRelatedOneCache("StatusItem")!""/> <#if statusItem?has_content> <#assign statusId = statusItem.statusId/> <#assign statusDescription = statusItem.get("description",locale)!statusItem.statusId /> <#assign orderAttrPickupStore = ORDER.getRelatedByAnd("OrderAttribute", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("attrName", "STORE_LOCATION"))!""/> <#if orderAttrPickupStore?has_content> <#assign pickupInStore="Y"/>

<#if pickupInStore == "Y" && statusId == "ORDER_COMPLETED"> Your Order is ready for Pickup! <#else> ${uiLabelMap.OrderStatusChangeMessage} ${statusItem.get("description",locale)?default(statusItem.statusId?default("N/A"))}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_DETAIL" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<#if ORDER?has_content> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_PAYMENTS" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_SHIPMENTS" ignoreTemplate="true"/> <@renderContentAsText contentId="E_ORDER_ITEM_SUMMARY" ignoreTemplate="true"/> </#if>

<#if ORDER_HELPER?exists> <#assign displayParty = ORDER_HELPER.getPlacingParty()?if_exists/> <#if displayParty?has_content> <#if !userLogin?exists || !userLogin?has_content> <#assign userLogin = USER_LOGIN! /> <#assign displayPartyNameResult = dispatcher.runSync("getPartyNameForDate", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("partyId", displayParty.partyId, "compareDate", ORDER.orderDate, "userLogin", userLogin))/>

${uiLabelMap.OrderInformationHeading}
${uiLabelMap.OrderNumberCaption} ${ORDER.orderId!}
${uiLabelMap.NameCaption} ${(displayPartyNameResult.fullName)?default("[Name Not Found]")}
${uiLabelMap.OrderDateCaption} ${ORDER.orderDate?string("yyyy-MM-dd")}

<#if ORDER_PAYMENTS?has_content || ORDER_PAYMENT_TYPE?has_content> <#assign payInStore="N"/> <#assign orderAttrPickupStore = ORDER.getRelatedByAnd("OrderAttribute", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("attrName", "STORE_LOCATION"))/> <#if orderAttrPickupStore?has_content> <#assign payInStore="Y"/> <#assign orderPaymentPref= ORDER_HELPER.getPaymentPreferences()/> <#list orderPaymentPref as orderPaymentPreference> <#assign paymentNumber = ""> <#assign creditCard = ""> <#assign oppStatusItem = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("StatusItem")> <#assign paymentMethod = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("PaymentMethod")?if_exists> <#assign paymentMethodType = orderPaymentPreference.getRelatedOne("PaymentMethodType")?if_exists> <#if "CREDIT_CARD" == orderPaymentPreference.paymentMethodTypeId> <#assign creditCard = paymentMethod.getRelatedOne("CreditCard")> <#if creditCard?has_content> <#assign cardType = creditCard.cardType!""> <#assign cardNumber = creditCard.cardNumber!""> <#assign paymentNumber = cardNumber?substring(cardNumber?length - 4)> <#assign paymentNumber = cardType + "-" + paymentNumber> <#if "GIFT_CARD" == orderPaymentPreference.paymentMethodTypeId> <#assign giftCard = paymentMethod.getRelatedOne("GiftCard")?if_exists> <#if giftCard?has_content> <#assign paymentNumber = giftCard.cardNumber!""> <#if payInStore == "Y" && paymentNumber?has_content> <#elseif payInStore == "Y" && paymentMethodType.paymentMethodTypeId == "EXT_COD"> <#else> <#if paymentNumber?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.PaymentInformationHeading}
Payment Method:${paymentMethodType.description?default(paymentMethodType.paymentMethodTypeId)}${uiLabelMap.PayInStoreLabel}${paymentMethodType.description?default(paymentMethodType.paymentMethodTypeId)}
Card Number: ${paymentNumber}
Amount: <@ofbizCurrency amount=orderPaymentPreference.maxAmount isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>

<#if ORDER_ITEM_SHIP_GROUP?has_content> <#assign groupIdx = 0> <#list ORDER_ITEM_SHIP_GROUP as shipGroup> <#assign storeGroup = ""> <#assign pickupInStore = "N"> <#assign orderAttrPickupStore = ORDER.getRelatedByAnd("OrderAttribute", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("attrName", "STORE_LOCATION"))/> <#if orderAttrPickupStore?has_content> <#assign orderAttribute= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(orderAttrPickupStore)/> <#assign storeId=orderAttribute.attrValue!/> <#assign storeParty= delegator.findOne("Party", {"partyId", storeId}, false)!""/> <#assign pickupInStore = "Y"> <#if storeParty?has_content> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= storeParty.getRelated("PartyContactMechPurpose")/> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByDate(storePartyContactPurpose,true)/> <#assign storePartyContactPurpose= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].orderBy(storePartyContactPurpose,Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toList("-fromDate"))/> <#assign storeLocations = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByAnd(storePartyContactPurpose, Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("contactMechPurposeTypeId", "GENERAL_LOCATION"))/> <#assign storeLocations= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getRelated("PartyContactMech", storeLocations)/> <#assign storeLocations= Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].filterByDate(storeLocations,true)/> <#assign storeLocations = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].orderBy(storeLocations,Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toList("fromDate DESC"))/> <#if storeLocations?has_content> <#assign storeLocation = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(storeLocations)/> <#assign shippingAddress= storeLocation.getRelatedOne("PostalAddress")/> <#assign storeGroup= delegator.findOne("PartyGroup", {"partyId", storeId}, false)!""/> <#else> <#assign shippingAddress = shipGroup.getRelatedOne("PostalAddress")?if_exists> <#assign groupNumber = shipGroup.shipGroupSeqId?if_exists> <#if shippingAddress?has_content> <#if storeGroup?has_content> <#else> <#if shippingAddress.toName?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address1?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address2?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.address3?has_content> <#if shippingAddress.city?has_content> <#assign shippingStateGeo = (delegator.findOne("Geo", {"geoId", shippingAddress.stateProvinceGeoId?if_exists}, false))?if_exists /> <#assign shippingCountryGeo = (delegator.findOne("Geo", {"geoId", shippingAddress.countryGeoId?if_exists}, false))?if_exists /> <#if shippingCountryGeo?has_content> <#assign shipmentMethodType = shipGroup.getRelatedOne("ShipmentMethodType")?if_exists> <#assign carrierPartyId = shipGroup.carrierPartyId?if_exists> <#if pickupInStore == "N"> <#if shipGroup.trackingNumber?has_content> <#assign trackingURLPartyContents = delegator.findByAnd("PartyContent", {"partyId": shipGroup.carrierPartyId, "partyContentTypeId": "TRACKING_URL"})/> <#if trackingURLPartyContents?has_content> <#assign trackingURLPartyContent = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(trackingURLPartyContents)/> <#if trackingURLPartyContent?has_content> <#assign content = trackingURLPartyContent.getRelatedOne("Content")/> <#if content?has_content> <#assign dataResource = content.getRelatedOne("DataResource")!""/> <#if dataResource?has_content> <#assign electronicText = dataResource.getRelatedOne("ElectronicText")!""/> <#assign trackingURL = electronicText.textData!""/> <#if trackingURL?has_content> <#assign trackingURL = Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.string.FlexibleStringExpander"].expandString(trackingURL, {"TRACKING_NUMBER":shipGroup.trackingNumber})/> <#if shipGroup.estimatedShipDate?has_content> <#if pickupInStore == "Y"> <#else> <#assign orderItemShipGroupAssoc = shipGroup.getRelated("OrderItemShipGroupAssoc")!""/> <#if orderItemShipGroupAssoc?has_content> <#assign groupIdx = groupIdx + 1>

Store Information

${uiLabelMap.ShippingInformationHeading}
${uiLabelMap.StorePickupCaption} ${storeGroup.groupName}
${uiLabelMap.DestinationCaption}
${shippingAddress.toName}
${shippingAddress.address1}
${shippingAddress.address2}
${shippingAddress.address3}
${shippingAddress.city}, ${shippingStateGeo.geoName!""} ${shippingAddress.postalCode!""}
${shippingCountryGeo.geoName!""}
${uiLabelMap.ShippingMethodCaption} ${carrierPartyId!""} <#if shipmentMethodType?exists>${shipmentMethodType.description!""}
${uiLabelMap.TrackingNumberCaption} ${shipGroup.trackingNumber!}
Pick Up Date:${uiLabelMap.ShipDateCaption} ${shipGroup.estimatedShipDate?string(FORMAT_DATE)}

${uiLabelMap.OrderItemsHeading}
<#list orderItemShipGroupAssoc as shipGroupAssoc> <#assign orderItem =shipGroupAssoc.getRelatedOne("OrderItem")!""/> <#assign product = orderItem.getRelatedOne("Product")?if_exists/> <#assign urlProductId = product.productId> <#if product.isVariant?if_exists?upper_case == "Y"> <#assign virtualProduct = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductWorker"].getParentProduct(product.productId, delegator)?if_exists> <#assign urlProductId=virtualProduct.productId> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (!productImageUrl?has_content && !(productImageUrl == "null")) && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (productImageUrl?string?has_content && (productImageUrl == "null"))> <#assign productImageUrl = ""> <#if !productImageUrl?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = "/osafe_theme/images/icon/place_holder_small.jpg"> <#assign itemStatus = orderItem.getRelatedOne("StatusItem")/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = delegator.findByAnd("OrderStatus", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("orderId",orderItem.orderId,"statusId",orderItem.statusId,"orderItemSeqId",orderItem.orderItemSeqId))/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(itemOrderStatus)/> <#assign itemTotal = (orderItem.unitPrice?number) * (shipGroupAssoc.quantity?number)> <#assign shipGroupAssocQty = shipGroupAssoc.quantity!1/> <#assign shipGroupSeqId = shipGroupAssoc.shipGroupSeqId!/> <#assign orderItemAttributes = orderItem.getRelatedCache("OrderItemAttribute")!""/> <#assign alreadyProcessedOrderItemAttributes = Static["javolution.util.FastList"].newInstance()/> <#assign orderItemAttributesChanged = Static["javolution.util.FastList"].newInstance()/> <#list orderItemAttributes as orderItemAttribute> <#assign attrName = orderItemAttribute.attrName!""/> <#if (attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_FROM_") || attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_TO_") || attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_TEXT_"))> <#assign iShipIdItem = attrName.lastIndexOf("_")/> <#if (iShipIdItem > -1 && attrName.substring(iShipIdItem+1).equals(shipGroupSeqId))> <#assign changedItemAttr = orderItemAttributesChanged.add(orderItemAttribute)> <#list 1 .. shipGroupAssocQty as count> <#assign orderItemAttributes = orderItem.getRelated("OrderItemAttribute")!""/> <#assign attrValue = ""/> <#assign countString = "" + count /> <#assign from = ""/> <#assign to = "" /> <#assign giftMessageText = ""/> <#assign seqId = ""/> <#list orderItemAttributesChanged as orderItemAttribute> <#assign attrName = orderItemAttribute.attrName!""/> <#if !seqId?has_content> <#if attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_FROM_")> <#assign iShipId = attrName.lastIndexOf("_")/> <#assign seqId = attrName.substring("GIFT_MSG_FROM_"?length, iShipId)!""/> <#if alreadyProcessedOrderItemAttributes.contains(seqId)> <#assign seqId = ""/> <#if !seqId?has_content> <#if attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_TO_")> <#assign iShipId = attrName.lastIndexOf("_")/> <#assign seqId = attrName.substring("GIFT_MSG_TO_"?length, iShipId)!""/> <#if alreadyProcessedOrderItemAttributes.contains(seqId)> <#assign seqId = ""/> <#if !seqId?has_content> <#if attrName.startsWith("GIFT_MSG_TEXT_")> <#assign iShipId = attrName.lastIndexOf("_")/> <#assign seqId = attrName.substring("GIFT_MSG_TEXT_"?length, iShipId)!""/> <#if alreadyProcessedOrderItemAttributes.contains(seqId)> <#assign seqId = ""/> <#assign changed = alreadyProcessedOrderItemAttributes.add(seqId)/> <#list orderItemAttributes as orderItemAttribute> <#assign attrName = orderItemAttribute.attrName!""/> <#if attrName.equals("GIFT_MSG_FROM_"+seqId+"_"+shipGroupSeqId)> <#assign from = orderItemAttribute.attrValue! /> <#if attrName.equals("GIFT_MSG_TO_"+seqId+"_"+shipGroupSeqId)> <#assign to = orderItemAttribute.attrValue! /> <#if attrName.equals("GIFT_MSG_TEXT_"+seqId+"_"+shipGroupSeqId)> <#assign giftMessageText = orderItemAttribute.attrValue! />
${uiLabelMap.QuantityLabel} ${uiLabelMap.PriceLabel} ${uiLabelMap.TotalLabel}
${StringUtil.wrapString(orderItem.itemDescription!)} <#if features?has_content> <#list features as feature> <#assign productFeatureType = feature.getRelatedOne("ProductFeatureType")>
${productFeatureType.description!""}: ${feature.description?default("")}
${shipGroupAssoc.quantity?string.number} <@ofbizCurrency amount=orderItem.unitPrice isoCode=ORDER_HELPER.getCurrency()/><@ofbizCurrency amount=itemTotal isoCode=ORDER_HELPER.getCurrency()/>
<#if to?has_content || giftMessageText?has_content || from?has_content> ${uiLabelMap.GiftMessageLabel}<#if (shipGroupAssocQty > 1)> ${count!}: <#if to?has_content>${uiLabelMap.ToCaption} ${to!} ${giftMessageText!} <#if from?has_content>${uiLabelMap.FromCaption} ${from!}

<#if ORDER_ITEMS?has_content> <#list ORDER_ITEMS as orderItem> <#assign product = orderItem.getRelatedOne("Product")?if_exists/> <#assign urlProductId = product.productId> <#if product.isVariant?if_exists?upper_case == "Y"> <#assign virtualProduct = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductWorker"].getParentProduct(product.productId, delegator)?if_exists> <#assign urlProductId=virtualProduct.productId> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (!productImageUrl?has_content && !(productImageUrl == "null")) && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (productImageUrl?string?has_content && (productImageUrl == "null"))> <#assign productImageUrl = ""> <#if !productImageUrl?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = "/osafe_theme/images/icon/place_holder_small.jpg"> <#assign itemStatus = orderItem.getRelatedOne("StatusItem")/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = delegator.findByAnd("OrderStatus", Static["org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilMisc"].toMap("orderId",orderItem.orderId,"statusId",orderItem.statusId,"orderItemSeqId",orderItem.orderItemSeqId))/> <#assign itemOrderStatus = Static["org.ofbiz.entity.util.EntityUtil"].getFirst(itemOrderStatus)/>

${uiLabelMap.OrderItemsHeading}
    ${uiLabelMap.QuantityLabel} ${uiLabelMap.PriceLabel} ${uiLabelMap.TotalLabel}
${StringUtil.wrapString(orderItem.itemDescription)} <#if features?has_content> <#list features as feature> <#assign productFeatureType = feature.getRelatedOne("ProductFeatureType")>
${productFeatureType.description!""}: ${feature.description?default("")}
${orderItem.quantity?string.number} <@ofbizCurrency amount=orderItem.unitPrice isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING /> <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_HELPER.getOrderItemSubTotal(orderItem,ORDER_HELPER.getAdjustments()) isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />

<#if ORDER_ITEMS?has_content>

${uiLabelMap.OrderSummaryHeading}
<#if ORDER_ADJUSTMENTS?has_content> <#list ORDER_ADJUSTMENTS as orderHeaderAdjustment> <#assign adjustmentType = orderHeaderAdjustment.getRelatedOne("OrderAdjustmentType")> <#assign productPromo = orderHeaderAdjustment.getRelatedOne("ProductPromo")!""> <#assign promoCodeText = ""/> <#if productPromo?has_content> <#assign promoText = productPromo.promoText?if_exists/> <#assign productPromoCode = productPromo.getRelated("ProductPromoCode")> <#assign promoCodesEntered = ORDER_HELPER.getProductPromoCodesEntered()!""/> <#if promoCodesEntered?has_content> <#list promoCodesEntered as promoCodeEntered> <#if productPromoCode?has_content> <#list productPromoCode as promoCode> <#assign promoCodeEnteredId = promoCodeEntered/> <#assign promoCodeId = promoCode.productPromoCodeId!""/> <#if promoCodeEnteredId?has_content> <#if promoCodeId == promoCodeEnteredId> <#assign promoCodeText = promoCode.productPromoCodeId?if_exists/> <#if (!Static["com.osafe.util.Util"].isProductStoreParmTrue(CHECKOUT_SUPPRESS_TAX_IF_ZERO!"")) || (ORDER_TAX_TOTAL?has_content && (ORDER_TAX_TOTAL > 0))>
${uiLabelMap.SubTotalLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_SUB_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />
<#if promoText?has_content>${promoText}<#if promoCodeText?has_content> (${promoCodeText} )<#else>${ORDER_HELPER.getAdjustmentType(orderHeaderAdjustment)} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_HELPER.getOrderAdjustmentTotal(orderHeaderAdjustment) isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />
${uiLabelMap.ShippingAndHandlingLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_SHIP_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>
${uiLabelMap.TaxLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_TAX_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING/>
${uiLabelMap.TotalLabel} <@ofbizCurrency amount=ORDER_TOTAL isoCode=ORDER_CURRENCY rounding=CURRENCY_UOM_ROUNDING />

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

We recently shipped items to you - we certainly hope you are enjoying our products.

We'd love to get your feedback!! Simply click on the Review link below and you will have an opportunity to post a review on our site.

<#list ORDER_ITEMS as orderItem> <#assign product = orderItem.getRelatedOne("Product")?if_exists/> <#assign urlProductId = product.productId> <#if product.isVariant?if_exists?upper_case == "Y"> <#assign virtualProduct = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductWorker"].getParentProduct(product.productId, delegator)?if_exists> <#assign urlProductId=virtualProduct.productId> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(product, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (!productImageUrl?has_content && !(productImageUrl == "null")) && virtualProduct?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = Static["org.ofbiz.product.product.ProductContentWrapper"].getProductContentAsText(virtualProduct, "SMALL_IMAGE_URL", locale, dispatcher)?if_exists> <#if (productImageUrl?string?has_content && (productImageUrl == "null"))> <#assign productImageUrl = ""> <#if !productImageUrl?has_content> <#assign productImageUrl = "/osafe_theme/images/user_content/image/place_holder_small.jpg">
${StringUtil.wrapString(orderItem.itemDescription)} ${uiLabelMap.ReviewLabel}
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Dear ${FIRST_NAME!""} ${LAST_NAME!""},

Just a quick notification to inform you of a recent change to your personal information.

If you did not make these changes then may we suggest that you return to ${EMAIL_CLNT_URL_DISP!""}, login and modify your password. This will protect you from further changes.

Your logon id is the Email address you supplied when you registered:

${LOGIN_EMAIL!""}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_HEADER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

Thank you for sign up for the ${EMAIL_CLNT_NAME!""} mailing list. You'll receive promotions and special offers at the email address below:

${uiLabelMap.EmailAddressCaption} ${parameters.SUBSCRIBER_EMAIL?if_exists}

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_COMMON_FOOTER" ignoreTemplate="true"/>

<@renderContentAsText contentId="E_HEAD_TAG" ignoreTemplate="true"/>
